param.name: genres
param.value: $PYTHON['true' if widgetContent in 'tvGenres' or widgetContent in 'movieGenres' or widgetContent in 'genres.xml' or widgetContent in 'Genres.xsp' or widgetContent in 'genres.xsp' else 'false']

param.name: studios

param.name: text
param.value: $PYTHON['true' if widgetContent in 'years.xml' or widgetContent in 'country.xml' or widgetContent in 'tags.xml' or widgetContent in 'directors.xml' or widgetContent in 'special://videoplaylists/' or widgetContent in 'years.xsp' or widgetContent in 'countries.xsp' or widgetContent in 'tags.xsp' or widgetContent in 'directors.xsp' or widgetContent in 'Years.xsp' or widgetContent in 'Countries.xsp' or widgetContent in 'Tags.xsp' or widgetContent in 'Directors.xsp' else 'false']
